WeWa UnionPay Diamond Card
WeWa UnionPay Diamond Card offers an attractive cash rebate of up to 4% for spending in specific categories. If you always spend on categories like “Travel”, “Cinema”, “Karaoke” and “Theme Park”, you can save a lot. With no annual income requirement, this Card offers a lower threshold for anyone who would like to apply for a UnionPay Card.

are you eligible?

Before the application through the MoneySmart, please first Turn off ad block; Clear the cookies; Don’t use incognito mode; Turn off the prevent cross-site tracking (Safari users) or Turn off do not track function (Chrome users)
After clicking MoneySmart’s designated link, please complete the application from asap; Do not open another web page.
